comment.description: A Ruby comment block including short summary, description, param, return, and example.

@param.description: Documents a single method parameter (either regular or keyword) with a given name, type and optional description.

@return.description: Describes the return value (and type or types) of a method. You can list multiple return tags for a method in the case where a method has distinct return cases. In this case, each case should begin with “if …”.
